descriptions.name: Overview of class
descriptions.value: Elucidation of organic and organometallic reaction mechanisms: experiment, theory, and selected case studies.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Suggested)
descriptions.value:
NOTE: Relevant chapters to be provided by instructor; book may be useful reference for some students

Modern Physical Organic Chemistry by Anslyn and Dougherty, University Science, 2005 ($142.50 new; $106.90 used)*

Organotransition Metal Chemistry: From Bonding to Catalysis by John Hartwig, 1st Edition, University Science, 2009.

*Prices as listed by the Norris Bookstore on 6/23/16. Prices offered by other vendors may be lower.
